summary: “Captures our shared human ache with stunning accuracy.” (Laleh Kavidi)
“Most readers will drop the novel in their laps with a jolt of self-recognition.” (Toral Jatin Gajarawala)
“Deft and engaging ....illuminates urgent questions in unexpected ways.” (Claire Messud)
“Affecting ... A thoughtful look at the small-scale fallout of an international issue.” (Starred Review)
“Digs deep into the nuances of love, pain, betrayal, and the promise of deliverance.” (Starred Review)
“Beautifully written ... Assured ... A tale that unfurls like a thriller.”
“A subtle portrait of two women who've been robbed of things they might never recover.”
